amendment.description: Page 47, after line 2, insert the following new section: ? SEC. 503. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Virginia Science Museum, VA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available for the Virginia Science Museum, VA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 359 (Roll no. 204).
